title: ASICS Watchface for Activity
summary: The first ASICS Watchface!It may make your lifestyle more active everyday.
developerAddress:
Asics
ALIVE MITAKE  1-2-5, Shibuya, Shibuya-ku, Tokyo, 150-0002, Japan
description: ​Introducing ASICS’ first custom watch face!Tracks your days progress and compare it with your previous days in a simple easy to read layout Your fitness buddy will motivate you to constantly improve!Compatible with both round and square facesAmbient mode for all day use​.
descriptionHTML:
​Introducing ASICS’ first custom watch face!

Tracks your days progress and compare it with your previous days in a simple easy to read layout
Your fitness buddy will motivate you to constantly improve!

Compatible with both round and square faces
Ambient mode for all day use​.
comments: Needs to have option to show progress at all times. And be able to have diffrent color faces.
Always seems to think that I'm Excellent,  does not record progress from yesterday
Only displays 24 hour time? Not in the military so show AM/PM.
recentChanges: Show time: Change 24h mode by 12h mode with AM/PM label.
